GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_threshold.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit d452ce36f2d4c402fa3f5275c9677f80166e7fc6, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 6b58e0a5f32dedb609438bb9c9c82aa6e23381f2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_threshold.
